example.code: New-DSTrust -DirectoryId d-123456ijkl -RemoteDomainName contoso.com -TrustDirection Two-Way -TrustType Forest -TrustPassword $Password -ConditionalForwarderIpAddr 172.31.36.96 t-9067157123
example.description: This example creates Two-Way Forestwide trust between your AWS Managed Microsoft AD directory, and existing on-premises Microsoft Active Directory.
